summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3605, for the improvement of Eddy Street and Warsaw Street, each from 38th Avenue South to 42nd Avenue South, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, under Ordinance No. 44504, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
